metadata.description: Meet Larry, Moe, and Curly: The Three Stooges! (Or, better yet, run away!) Wherever these three go, mayhem is sure to follow. Ever since these knuckleheads appeared on the doorstep of the Sisters of Mercy Orphanage the world hasn't been safe from eye-pokes, slaps-in-the-face, and uncountable dollars' worth of property damage!
metadata.name: The Three Stooges
